MOUSE PAD SET MATERIALS: The surface of the mouse pad is made of smooth and breathable Lycra silky cloth to ensure maximum softness and comfort during use. We use advanced printing technology for patterns, which are colorful, easy to clean and not fade.

HIGH QUALITY MEMORY FOAM WRIST REST SUPPORT SET: The edge of the wrist rest is reinforced to prevent deformation, damage and roll-up to ensure a longer use time. The soft memory foam-filled cushion part will slowly bounce back when your hand leave it, not easy to out of shape.

description: Are you tired of using an ordinary mouse pad in your daily work,study and playing? Have you ever suffered from wrist pain or hideous scars due to keeping the same posture for too long? If the answers are YES,please have a try at our amazing ergonomic mouse wrist rest and memory foam wrist rest with support sets.

❤ Ergonomic shape and just the right height keeps your wrist in a natural position rather than a twisted angle. ❤ Non-slip textured bottom with the natural rubber material to prevent gliding or unnecessary movement. ❤ Memory foam structure, comfortable lightweight and durable, no deformation. Adopt soft and breathable materials to provide lasting support for your wrist. ❤ The wrist pad is separate so you have the option to use the mouse pad with or without it, and can place it wherever is comfortable for you. ❤ Mouse keyboard wrist rest set is a perfect office gift for colleagues, friends, teachers, boss, etc.

● Material: Surface Lycra fabric + Memory foam + Bottom rubber ● Mouse pad size: 7.08 x 5.9 inch ● Wrist mouse pad size: 6.81 x 3.7 inch ● Raised support part size: 0.98 inch ● Cup coaster size: 3.9 x 3.9 inch
